Posts.Content: Make sure you go on YouTube and search for Robin Roberts' videos. She has one when she shaved her head, one on her last day of chemo, and one when she took off the wig for good. (Also she was in a fashion show.) They are very informative and very upbeat. I say treat this disease as aggressively as possible. Make sure you've done all you can do. I want no recurrences and no regrets.
Posts.Title: Surgical Pathology Report
